member.name: T:System.Extensions.Security.PronounceablePasswordGenerator
member.summary: Generates passwords that are pronounceable. Original Java code from http://www.multicians.org/thvv/gpw.html. This class is free to use without restrictions.

member.name: M:System.Extensions.Security.PronounceablePasswordGenerator.Generate(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates a set of pronounceable passwords.
member.param: The number of passwords to generate.
The character length of the passwords.
member.returns: A list of passwords as strings.
